name: Low Income
description: You have a low income, maybe it's expected, otherwice do something
help: You need to check your products, and sellings

name: Bancruptcy Risk
description: You have less than a 0.5 of a year, to pay your debts.
help: Seems your credits are not bearable for you, and the payday is close.

name: Revenue
description: You have a positive saldo now.

name: Credit End
help: You can get a new one, if you need.

name: Campaign End
description: You campaign came to an end.
help: Check your product popularity, it shoud grow a bit.

name: Popularity Boost
description: Great, you have a boost of popularity for some of your products.
help: Check your product popularity, it shoud grow a bit.

name: Popularity Decline
description: You product popularity reduced a bit.

name: Popularity Drop
description: You product popularity hit the floor.

name: Project End
description: Project came to an end, check the results, reassign employees.

name: Product Cracked
help: Someone stole/cracked your product, you need to patch it with security fixes immediately.

name: Product Failed
description: You product failed to upgrade once again, and no one will use it.
help: This product is lost. If you still have some proposals, sell it until you can.

name: Role Absent
description: You missing some of key roles now.
help: Some of your key/required positions are empty, hurry to fill em up.

name: No Developers
description: You have no developers, product development impossible.

name: Not Estimated Product
description: You have no developers, product development impossible.
help: You need go to product/projects, and click on non-estimated projects, to estimate or cancel them.
